column4: What does this mean? Gtk-WARNING **: /build/buildd/gtk+2.0-2.12.9/gtk/gtkwidget.c:8547: widget class `GtkPizza' has no property named `row-ending-details'
Hey what is a GTK WARNING?
try to # aptitude install pulseaudio and then $ padsp audacity
that is how I get this error
and before thet u can remove ~/.audacity ;) that should help
u r running it with pulseaudio?
I cannot do that second one as there is something I am trying to recover.
what r u trying to recover?
I already did this # aptitude install pulseaudio and then $ padsp audacity a few weeks ago & I always run it as padsp audacity.
I am trying to recover an audio recording I recorded myself in it, but every time I tell it to recover it it freezes.
i've never met sth like this, i'm sorry ;)
Understandable, very few people have met something likle me.
